meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one billionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used nanometres to measure the tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The nanometres on the scale helped in determining the size of the object.
meanings.sent3: I tried to measure the ant with nanometres, but it kept moving!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so precise, it was like she could see in nanometres.
meanings.sent5: The nanometres in the experiment revealed the intricate structure of the material.
